name: add-integrations
description: Add integrations: Discord notifications, Telegram alerts, Slack webhooks, email reports
verification: Created integration modules: 1) discord.sh - Discord webhook notifications with task status updates, 2) telegram.sh - Telegram Bot API notifications, 3) slack.sh - Slack webhook with rich message blocks, 4) notify.sh - Master script to send notifications to all platforms. All scripts are in integrations/ directory, configurable via config.json, with logging to logs/integrations.log
